DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Breast Reconstruction Other Tissue Flap Performed Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record information related to breast reconstruction in which a flap of tissue is surgically moved from another area of the body to the chest, and formed into a new breast mound, other than those previously mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Breast Reconstruction Other Tissue Flap Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a surgical procedure in which a flap of tissue is surgically moved from another area of the body to the chest, and formed into a new breast mound, other than those previously mentioned.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredName: Breast Reconstruction Other Tissue Flap Reconstruction Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: Surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A type of breast reconstruction in which a flap of tissue is surgically moved from another area of the body to the chest, and formed into a new breast mound.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Breast reconstruction that uses tissues taken from other parts of the individual's body.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
